thought: To fulfill the user request, we need to define the necessary trigger and actions for Google Sheets read, AI completion, and Slack message posting.
plan: Define manualTrigger default trigger to start the workflow.
Define googleSheets sheet read action to read news headlines.
Define aiCompletion default action to classify news headlines.
Define slack message post action to send classification results.
criticism: Currently, no functions are defined, so we cannot implement the workflow yet.

functions.comments: Trigger the workflow manually on button click.
Read all rows from the specified Google Sheet.
Classify each news headline as technology or sport using AI.
Send classification results as Slack messages to #general channel.
